alert.note: Alert for Allen; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:53AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wilson, northern Neosho, southern Woodson and southern Allen Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1052 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Buffalo, or 9 miles southeast of Yates Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chanute, Humboldt, Yates Center, Erie, Buffalo, Savonburg, Elsmore, Stark, Batesville, Petrolia, Rose, Chanute Airport, Iola Airport, and Toronto Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
